import React, { useState } from "react"; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; import useInterval from "../utils/useInterval"; import BreakButtons from "./BreakButtons"; function Pomodoro() { // Timer starts out paused const [isTimerRunning, setIsTimerRunning] = useState(false); useInterval( () => { // ToDo: Implement what should happen when the timer is running }, isTimerRunning ? 1000 : null ); function playPause() { setIsTimerRunning((prevState) => !prevState); } return (

); } export default Pomodoro;
